priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C113858

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code Terminology

definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale test code.
name: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less alert.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Less Alert

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty paying attention for long periods of time.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Difficulty Paying Attention for Long Time

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been unable to think clearly.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Unable to Think Clearly
synonyms: MFIS01-Have Been Unable to Think Clearly

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been clumsy and uncoordinated.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Clumsy and Uncoordinated

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been forgetful.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Forgetful

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had to pace myself in my physical activities.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Pace Myself in Physical Activities

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to do anything that requires physical effort.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Do Anything That Requires Physical Effort

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to participate in social activities.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Participate in Social Activities

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been limited in my ability to do things away from home.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Limited in My Abilities to Do Things Away From Home
synonyms: MFIS01-Limited in Ability Away From Home

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble maintaining physical effort for long periods.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Maintain Physical Effort

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty making decisions.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Difficulty Making Decisions

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to do anything that requires thinking.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Do Anything That Requires Thinking

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks my muscles have felt weak.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Muscles Have Felt Weak

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been physically uncomfortable.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Been Physically Uncomfortable

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble finishing tasks that require thinking.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Finishing Tasks That Require Thinking

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty organizing my thoughts when doing things at home or at work.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Difficulty Organizing My Thoughts

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less able to complete tasks that require physical effort.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Less Able to Complete Tasks That Require Physical Effort

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks my thinking has been slowed down.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - My Thinking Has Been Slowed Down
synonyms: MFIS01-My Thinking Has Been Slowed Down

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble concentrating.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Concentrating

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have limited my physical activities.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Have Limited My Physical Activities

terms.definition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have needed to rest more often or for longer periods.
terms.preferredTerm: MFIS - Need to Rest More Often or Longer
synonyms: MFIS01-Need to Rest More Often or Longer
